nodes.text: Red Line was a band from Alderaan, whose career ended before the start of the Galactic Civil War.

This band raised controversial issues before the destruction of the planet. Their songs contained usual instances of verbal violence against the highest political circles, as the band considered themselves to be the voice of the marginalized.
Red Line was founded by Soltan Wostikian, a young socialite from the Outer Rim world of Hashaulh. The famous Alderaanian poetess Hari Seldona sometimes wrote for the band.
The band Red Line was created by Philippe Rat for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario Prélude à un Nouvel Espoir which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 103.
